titlePart.supplied: Short Statement on an International Placement Bureau

sourceDesc.bibl: Wants Skill Bureau, Greenburg Daily News , July 26, 1947, p. 3

docBody.head: Wants Skill Bureau
docBody.p: Margaret Sanger, in a broadcast to Europe: "I'd like to see an international placement bureau- a labor pool of skills and professions. Individuals from this pool could be sent to any part of the world where they are needed. Just think of them highly trained people wasting away in displaced persons camps."
